transcript:
[Daria] 13:00:00
Hello! I'm Daria, a UX researcher. Click "Start Interview" when you're ready to begin.

[Daria] 13:00:30
Welcome to our user study! Do we have your permission to proceed?

[You] 13:01:00
Yes, you have my permission to proceed.

[Daria] 13:01:30
Thank you for your cooperation. Could you please describe how you first became interested in ice fishing in Greenland?

[You] 13:02:00
Well, I first became interested in ice fishing by watching some YouTube people that have a family in Alaska. And in the winter, they go out to these lakes in Pocahontas and have a heated tent and they catch a lot of fish. And then I saw Greenland in the news and I thought I should do ice fishing in Greenland just to get both.

[Daria] 13:02:30
That's interesting. After deciding on Greenland, what steps did you take to prepare for your ice fishing experience there?

[You] 13:03:00
Well, I next looked at different locations or lakes that have guides nearby, and then after that I made sure I had the equipment to stay warm in the tents, and I had those pre-shipped up to Greenland, and then I booked my flight, and I had a rental car ready when I got there, and then the last thing I did was try to find the availability of a guide that could help me.

[Daria] 13:03:30
That's a well-thought-out plan. Can you walk me through a typical day of ice fishing in Greenland? How did you interact with the environment and the equipment?

[You] 13:04:00
Well the typical days you kind of look where you are on the ice and you kind of walk out there and find about the Depth that you want to go and then you start drilling holes We had a big drill we put four holes and we had some flash ups that we hooked in some of them and then we put The tent together and in the tent We had a more of a square hole that we cut out with a saw and some seating and we had a moat heart Heater, which was a heart a wood stove and that's where we spent most the time that we would

Interview stopped by user. Saving transcript and generating analysis...
title: Interview with Anonymous - 2025-04-22
